event.title: the last quarter of the 17th century, Ilocos and Bulacan natives

data.event: During the last quarter of the 17th century, Ilocos and Bulacan natives migrated to Sto.

event.title: was later demoted to a mere barangay of Talavera, Nueva Ecija in 1903

data.event: The settlement became a Municipio but was later demoted to a mere barangay of Talavera, Nueva Ecija in 1903.
Following the Allied liberation in 1945, over 4,500 Filipino soldiers and guerrillas had been killed or wounded, and 29,000 Japanese troops killed or captured in action.
